description: Featuring a striking design that is out of this world, JBL’s new Creature® III multimedia loudspeaker system delivers high-performance sound right from your laptop or desktop computer. Thanks to JBL’s proprietary speaker design and electronics, the sound quality from the Creature III speakers is simply extraordinary. And thanks to the Creature III’s 3.5mm stereo mini-jack, great sound isn’t limited to just your computer. Flexible connectivity allows connection to other audio devices, including iPod music machines and MP3 players. So whether you’re checking the news or playing the latest game, bring unworldly style and exceptional sound quality to your computer experience with the JBL Creature III speaker system. It sounds as good as it looksAttack of the killer speakers.
title: JBL Creature III Self-Powered Multimedia Satellite and Subwoofer System
